price: 49 qui, loin des regards, craignent leur Seigneur et redoutent l’avènement de l’Heure.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَهُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّاعَةِ مُشۡفِقُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yakhshawna rabbahum bil-ghaybi wahum mina al-sāʿati mush'fiqūna
